mapper.select: {CALL sp_producto_inicial_ins( #{idProductoInicial, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{fechaRegistro, jdbcType = DATE, mode = IN}, #{prensa, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{tipoLadrillo, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{cantidadProducido, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{cantidadEstimada, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{activo, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{usuarioCreacion, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{resultado, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = OUT} ) }
